text: I am safe right now, in this moment
This feeling will pass, like clouds in the sky
I am exactly where I need to be
I am grounded and secure
I trust in my ability to navigate this moment
I am protected and supported
This too shall pass
I am stronger than my anxiety
I have overcome challenges before, and I will again
My resilience grows with each breath
I trust in my ability to handle whatever comes
I am capable and strong
Every challenge makes me stronger
I have the power to choose my response
I am a warrior of peace
I deserve peace and calm
With each breath, I release tension
I choose peace over worry
Calm is always available to me
I breathe in peace, I breathe out stress
Serenity flows through me
I am at peace with what is
Stillness lives within me
I am worthy of love and kindness
I treat myself with gentleness
It's okay to not be okay sometimes
I am doing the best I can, and that is enough
I forgive myself for my mistakes
I am human, and that's perfectly okay
I speak to myself with kindness
My feelings are valid
I am here, right now, and that is all that matters
This moment is a fresh start
I release what I cannot control
The present moment is where my power lives
I focus on what I can do right now
I am fully present in this breath
Now is all I have, and it is enough
I return to this moment with ease
I am growing through what I'm going through
Every challenge makes me wiser
I bend but I do not break
My courage is greater than my fear
I rise stronger from every setback
I trust the journey, even when I don't understand it
I am resilient, capable, and brave
Each day brings new possibilities
